actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay provisions for physicians in the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
short_title: Armed Forces Physicians Pay Act of 1979

summary.text: Armed Forces Physicians Pay Act of 1979 - Revises the special pay provisions for: (1) medical officers of the armed forces and Public Health Services; (2) dentists and physicians in the armed forces who extend their service on active duty; and (3) medical officers of the Public Health Service who execute active duty agreements.

titles.title: Armed Forces Physicians Pay Act of 1979
A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay provisions for physicians in the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
